title: YouTube Creator Analyzer
description: Analyze YouTube channels for brand partnership potential. Provide your YouTube Data API v3 key and a list of channels.

apiKey.title: YouTube Data API v3 Key
apiKey.description: Your YouTube Data API v3 key. Get one free at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/library/youtube.googleapis.com

channels.title: Channel Inputs
channels.description: List of YouTube channels to analyze. Accepts channel URLs, @handles, or channel IDs.

videosPerChannel.title: Videos to Analyze Per Channel
videosPerChannel.description: Number of recent videos to analyze per channel. More videos = more accurate metrics but more API quota used (~1 unit per 50 videos).

enableSponsorshipDetection.title: Enable Sponsorship Detection
enableSponsorshipDetection.description: Scan video descriptions for sponsorship indicators (#ad, affiliate links, brand deals). No extra API cost.

enableAuthenticityCheck.title: Enable Engagement Authenticity Check
enableAuthenticityCheck.description: Run statistical analysis to detect potentially inauthentic engagement (bought views, fake likes). No extra API cost.

enableRateCard.title: Generate Rate Cards
enableRateCard.description: Generate estimated sponsorship rate cards based on channel metrics and tier.

minSubscribers.title: Minimum Subscribers
minSubscribers.description: Skip channels below this subscriber count. Set to 0 to include all.

minEngagementRate.title: Minimum Engagement Rate (%)
minEngagementRate.description: Skip channels below this engagement rate. Set to 0 to include all.
